OOC: No his left arm was dislocated not detached he simply relocated it by 
slamming himself into the ground.  Also apparently you just came very close 
to killing my character which is a major breach of etiquette if not moding.  
And thanks Dechande.

::Enertron::
    He detected the incoming Galvatron on scanners as he was in coming at 
him.  He was unprepared but far from defenseless.  As Galvatron grabbed him 
he stuck his hand between them and unleashed the most powerful blast he could 
muster.  This blast would make a large hole in any typical bot and send them 
reeling away.  Of course Galvatron was far from ordinary, he was apparently 
unable to be hit or damaged by anything.
